CustomField.description:
NICC-025235
This field is referenced in the "AH_FetchTrialExpirationBatch" Apex Class. It is automatically checked (set to true) if "ExpiredPassword" is returned from the web services call when logging into a customer fdc Salesforce org.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically checked if "ExpiredPassword" is returned from the web services call when logging into a customer fdc Salesforce org. This is part of the nightly "Fetch Trial Expiration Dates" Apex Job in the Amadeus Hospitality SF Org.
CustomField.label: Expired Password
